name: Re:Birth
description:
What will happen when one twin dies and leaves the other one behind?

Would the one left behind fall into insanity or simply accept the truth?

Follow Shouyu as he tries to revive his twin brother by killing someone to use as a sacrifice.

This is my first game, (so please don’t judge me harshly T-T) . This is a short story based game with simple QuickTime events. There’s 6 possible endings, and a playthrough is around 5-10 minutes.

Content warning: flashing and non-graphic depictions of violence and death.
